index.suscripcion_descripcion: Receive email updates about our store and special offers

shop-single-product-2.suscripcion_descripcion: Receive updates via email about our store and special offers

page-about-us.texto1: At Vestore, we specialize in the import and export of a wide variety of high-quality products, catering to the needs of both retailers and wholesalers. Our commitment is to offer efficient and personalized service, helping our clients access international products with ease and confidence.
page-about-us.texto2: Our commitment is to provide efficient and personalized service, facilitating access to international products with ease and confidence. We understand that each client has unique needs, so we provide tailored solutions, whether for large wholesale volumes or smaller quantities for retail businesses. Our team of experts is always available to advise you and ensure a hassle-free import and export experience.
page-about-us.texto3: In addition to our import and export services, we sell all types of products wholesale and retail through our e-commerce platform. Our online platform www.vestore.com.ar is designed to be user-friendly, allowing our customers to browse and shop comfortably from anywhere. We offer a wide range of products, from electronics and fashion to home goods and more, ensuring you always find what you need. With fast and secure shipping, we ensure that your shopping experience is convenient and satisfying at all times.
page-about-us.descripcion1: We facilitate international trade with personalized import and export services.
page-about-us.descripcion2: We offer a wide range of products to satisfy both retailers and wholesalers.
page-about-us.descripcion3: Shop high-quality products quickly and securely through our online platform.
page-about-us.descripcion4: We provide exceptional customer support to ensure a satisfying shopping experience.
page-about-us.personas_que_trabajan: The People Working at Vestore Share the Same Vision and Values
page-about-us.saber_de_ti: Our team would love to hear from you!

page-term.texto1: Welcome! Here you will find our Terms and Conditions of Use. At Vestore, we care about your privacy and protect your personal data with great care. We want you to feel safe while browsing and shopping with us. Read our policies to understand how we handle your information and what rights you have over it.
page-term.texto2: It is a necessary requirement for the purchase of the products offered on this site that you read and accept the following Terms and Conditions. The use of our services, as well as the purchase of our products, will imply that you have read and accepted the Terms and Conditions of Use in this document. All the products offered by our website may be created, charged, sent, or presented by a third-party website and would be subject to their own Terms and Conditions. In some cases, to acquire a product, it will be necessary for the user to register, with the input of true personal data and definition of a password.
page-term.texto3: The user can choose and change the password for their account access at any time, in case they have registered and it is necessary for the purchase of any of our products. https://vestore.com.ar does not assume responsibility if the user gives such a password to third parties.
page-term.texto4: All purchases and transactions carried out through this website are subject to a confirmation and verification process, which could include checking the stock and availability of the product, payment method validation, invoice validation (if any), and compliance with the conditions required by the selected payment method. In some cases, email verification may be required.
page-term.texto5: The prices of the products offered on this Online Store are valid only for purchases made on this website.
page-term.texto6: Vestore, through its website, grants a license for users to use the products sold on this website according to the Terms and Conditions described in this document.
page-term.texto7: If applicable (for software sales, templates, or other design and programming products), you cannot place one of our products, modified or unmodified, on a CD, website, or any other medium and offer them for redistribution or resale of any kind.
page-term.texto8: You cannot declare intellectual or exclusive property of any of our products, modified or unmodified. All products are the property of the content providers. Unless otherwise specified, our products are provided without any warranty, express or implied. In no event shall this company be liable for any damages including, but not limited to, direct, indirect, special, incidental, or consequential damages or other losses resulting from the use or inability to use our products.
page-term.texto9: In the case of irrevocable non-tangible goods, we do not make refunds after the product is shipped, you have the responsibility to understand before buying it. Please read carefully before buying. We make exceptions to this rule only when the product description does not match the product. There are some products that may have a warranty and the possibility of a refund, but this will be specified when purchasing the product. In such cases, the warranty will only cover factory defects and will only be effective when the product has been used correctly. The warranty does not cover damage or breakage due to misuse. The terms of the warranty are associated with manufacturing and operating conditions under normal use of the products and will only be effective if the equipment has been used correctly. This includes:
page-term.item1: According to the technical specifications indicated for each product.
page-term.item2: In environmental conditions according to the specifications indicated by the manufacturer.
page-term.item3: In specific use for the function it was designed for at the factory.
page-term.item4: In operating electrical conditions according to the specifications and tolerances indicated.
page-term.texto10: The customer's purchase may be delayed for antifraud verification. It can also be suspended for longer for a more rigorous investigation, to avoid fraudulent transactions.
page-term.texto11: This https://www.vestore.com.ar guarantees that the personal information you send has the necessary security. The data entered by the user or in case of requiring order validation will not be delivered to third parties unless it must be disclosed in compliance with a court order or legal requirements.
page-term.texto12: Subscription to email newsletters is voluntary and could be selected at the time of creating your account.
page-term.texto13: Vestore reserves the rights to change or modify these terms without prior notice.
page-term.texto14: Thank you for supporting Ecom. To protect your personal data when you use Ecom's services, we have drafted this privacy policy.

politicas-privacidad.texto1: At Vestore, we care about your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This section explains how we collect, use, and protect your information. Our goal is to ensure the security of your data and to guarantee that you have control over your personal information. We invite you to review our policies to better understand our practices and how you can manage your data.
politicas-privacidad.texto2: Personal data means any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person ('data subject'); an identifiable natural person is one who can be identified, directly or indirectly, in particular by reference to an identifier such as a name, an identification number, location data. Personal data does not include data that has been irreversibly anonymized or aggregated so that it cannot be used to identify you, whether in combination with other information or otherwise.
politicas-privacidad.texto3: Below are described the types of personal data we may collect and how we may use them:
politicas-privacidad.texto4: Depending on the products and services you choose, we collect different types of your personal data or about you.
politicas-privacidad.texto5: (a) Data you provide. We collect personal data you provide when you create an account to use our products and services or interact with us, such as when you complete account information, participate in our online surveys or promotions, leave comments on products, use our online help tool or chat, or send us an email.
politicas-privacidad.texto6: Upon obtaining your permission, access to Photos/Media/Files may include the ability to:
politicas-privacidad.item1: Read the contents of your USB storage (such as SD card).
politicas-privacidad.item2: Add content to your USB storage.
politicas-privacidad.texto7: We may collect and store information (including personal data) locally on your device using mechanisms such as your browser's web storage (including HTML 5) and app data caches.
politicas-privacidad.texto8: Camera. You can upload photos when commenting through online services. In this case, we need to collect images and other information from your device.
politicas-privacidad.texto9: Unique application numbers. Certain services include a unique application number. These numbers and related information about your installation (e.g., the operating system type and application version number) may be sent to the website when you install or uninstall those services or when those services periodically contact our servers (e.g., for automatic updates).
politicas-privacidad.sepaso: If you make a purchase, we collect personal data related to the purchase, including the product you purchased, transaction number, username, shipping address, and other authentication information, as well as billing and contact details.
politicas-privacidad.texto10: (d) Data about improving our services and products. When you visit our websites, we may collect data about the type of device you use, your device's unique identifier, your device's IP address, your operating system, the type of internet browser you use, usage information, diagnostic information, and location data about or from computers, phones, or other devices where you install or access our products or services. Where available, our services may use GPS, your IP address, and other technologies to determine the approximate location of a device to enable us to improve our products and services.
politicas-privacidad.texto11: With your explicit prior consent, we collect your personal data:
politicas-privacidad.texto12: (a) Directly from you as described above, including information generated when you use our services and products;
politicas-privacidad.texto13: (b) From your terminal equipment as described above;
politicas-privacidad.texto14: (c) From our partners. These are third parties like Google, Facebook, Twitter, VK, etc. When you log into our websites via these accounts, we may automatically obtain your login information because these third parties have previously authorized us to collect your information to help you conveniently log in.
politicas-privacidad.texto15: (d) From Cookies and Similar Technologies. When you visit our website, we automatically collect technical information like your IP address through cookies.
politicas-privacidad.texto16: 2. How We Use Cookies and Similar Technologies.
politicas-privacidad.texto17: We use cookies and similar technologies to provide, protect, and improve our products and services, such as personalizing content, offering and measuring advertisements, understanding user behavior, and providing a safer experience. You can delete or reject cookies using your browser or device settings, but in some cases, doing so may affect your ability to use our products and services.
politicas-privacidad.texto18: Cookies are small text files that websites you visit place on your device. Cookies perform various functions, such as remembering your preferences and chosen items, helping to improve your site experience, and attempting to ensure that online ads or offers you see are more relevant to you. In themselves, cookies are harmless and fulfill crucial functions for websites. These 'cookies' can be divided into 4 types, each of which is described below.
politicas-privacidad.texto20: These cookies are essential for you to browse our website and use its fundamental services, such as visiting our website or making a purchase.
politicas-privacidad.texto21: These cookies do not require your consent. If you disable these cookies, we may not be able to fulfill your basic request.
politicas-privacidad.texto23: These cookies collect anonymous information about how people use the site, and data is combined with other users to enable us to improve site performance. This includes third-party analytics cookies that are for the exclusive use of the owner of the visited website. For example, we use Google Analytics cookies to help us understand how customers arrive at our site, browse or use our site, and highlight areas where we can improve aspects such as navigation, shopping experience, and marketing campaigns.
politicas-privacidad.texto24: The data stored by these cookies never show personal details that could establish your individual identity. If you disable or reject these cookies, you may not be able to use certain features of our websites and services, and it may reduce the support or information we can provide you.
politicas-privacidad.texto26: These cookies allow our site to remember the choices you've made about your preferences, such as the language you prefer, or what your username and password are so you can log in automatically and we can offer you better services and improve your shopping experience. If you reject these cookies, you may feel that web browsing efficiency has decreased.
politicas-privacidad.texto28: These cookies track information about your browsing habits to recommend more personalized advertising. These cookies may remember your activities online and/or on third-party sites or services, and share them with third parties such as advertisers. For example, by placing these cookies, you can share pages and content on our websites and services through social networks and other third-party websites. However, we will only allow third-party cookies on our websites with your explicit consent. To understand how third parties use cookies, review their privacy policies. If you reject these cookies, you will also see ads that are not as relevant to you, which may affect your shopping experience.
politicas-privacidad.texto29: When you first enter the website, we request your consent for cookies through a cookie banner. You can select the types of cookies that suit you. Please note that if you choose to reject cookies, your access to certain features may be restricted.
politicas-privacidad.texto30: You can delete or reject cookies using your browser or device settings. Most web browsers accept cookies automatically, but you can modify your browser settings by visiting the Help section of your browser's toolbar. Your mobile device may also allow you to control cookies through its settings. For more details, refer to the device manufacturer's instructions.
politicas-privacidad.texto31: It's worth mentioning that you may need to reselect cookies on our websites after clearing the cookie cache.
politicas-privacidad.texto32: DPAPI (Data Protection Application Programming Interface) is a simple cryptographic application programming interface available as a built-in component in Windows 2000 and later versions of Microsoft Windows operating systems. In theory, the Data Protection API can enable symmetric encryption of any type of data; in practice, its primary use in the Windows operating system is to perform symmetric encryption of cryptographic private keys, using a key derived from the user's Windows password.
politicas-privacidad.texto33: HTML5 Web Storage is a better solution than cookies. Web Storage, or Web Storage, allows websites to store data within the browser on the user's device. Web storage APIs are secure and, unlike cookies, can store a large amount of data. They are saved on the user's device, and any script on the same source can access them.
politicas-privacidad.texto34: 3. How We Use Your Personal Data.
politicas-privacidad.texto35: We may process your personal data for the purposes described in this privacy policy with your prior consent, to comply with legal obligations, or when we have an assessment that doing so is necessary to protect our legitimate interests or those of a third party to whom we may disclose information.
politicas-privacidad.texto36: (a) Creating and maintaining your user account.
politicas-privacidad.texto37: (b) Providing, improving, and developing our products and services.
politicas-privacidad.texto38: (c) Processing your purchase transactions, processing your orders, and delivering products to you, processing payments, or any other related transaction.
politicas-privacidad.texto39: (d) Communicating with you and responding to your inquiries or requests.
politicas-privacidad.texto40: (e) Offering technical support and customer care.
politicas-privacidad.texto41: (f) Preventing and prosecuting fraud and conducting fraud-related investigations.
politicas-privacidad.texto42: (g) Complying with legal and regulatory requirements.
politicas-privacidad.texto43: (h) Understanding your behavior on our websites and services and personalizing our marketing and advertising.
politicas-privacidad.texto44: (i) Enhancing security and protecting the rights and property of users and third parties.
politicas-privacidad.texto45: 4. How We Share and Disclose Your Personal Data.
politicas-privacidad.texto46: We only share your personal data as described in this privacy policy. We may share your personal data with:
politicas-privacidad.texto47: 4.1 Service Providers. External service providers who process personal data on our behalf, such as data analytics companies, marketing service providers, hosting and storage services, customer service services, etc.
politicas-privacidad.texto48: 4.2 Business Partners. Business partners with whom we offer products and services jointly.
politicas-privacidad.texto49: 4.3 Compliance with Law and Security. In case of an emergency, if we are required by law to do so, or if we believe it is necessary to protect our rights and the rights of our users and the public.
politicas-privacidad.texto51: We use appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, loss, or destruction. However, no system is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the security of your data at all times.
politicas-privacidad.texto53: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary for the purposes described in this privacy policy or as required by law.
politicas-privacidad.texto55: You have the right to access, rectify, or delete your personal data, as well as to restrict or object to the processing of your personal data. You also have the right to data portability.
politicas-privacidad.texto56: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or wish to exercise your rights, you can contact us through the information provided on our website.
politicas-privacidad.texto57: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time, so we recommend reviewing it periodically.

politicas-reembolso.texto1: At Vestore, we strive to offer the highest quality products and ensure an exceptional shopping experience. We understand that you may occasionally need to return an item or request a refund. If you are not completely satisfied, our return and refund process is straightforward and fair. Below, you will find the steps and conditions to manage your request quickly and efficiently. We are here to ensure you have a hassle-free shopping experience.
politicas-reembolso.titulo2: How to request a return due to product dissatisfaction:
politicas-reembolso.texto2: If you are not satisfied with the product or have changed your mind about your purchase, you can request a refund within 7 days from the date of receipt of the order.
politicas-reembolso.titulo3: To validate the return due to dissatisfaction:
politicas-reembolso.item1: The product must be in good working condition and without visible damage due to misuse.
politicas-reembolso.item2: The product must retain its original packaging without signs of mistreatment.
politicas-reembolso.texto3: To initiate the process, it is necessary to send an email to contact@vestore.com.ar indicating your full name and order number. You will receive your refund within 30 days after the returned products are received. The amount will be refunded using the same payment method you selected when purchasing from our online store, however, return costs will be borne by the customer.
politicas-reembolso.titulo4: How to request a return due to defective product:
politicas-reembolso.texto5: To do so, you must send an email to contact@vestore.com.ar indicating your full name, order number, and information about the manufacturing defect of your product (description with photos or videos). We will review your case, and the amount will be refunded using the same payment method you selected when purchasing from our online store. There will be no additional cost for you to receive your refund.
politicas-reembolso.texto6: Following the provisions of the Federal Consumer Protection Law, return shipping costs for dissatisfaction or regret will be borne by the customer. However, in the case of returns due to defective products or damage during shipping, return costs are covered by us.
politicas-reembolso.texto7: After sending us the email, you will receive an authorization code to your email along with a guide to send the merchandise through our logistics operator. The product must be sent in its original packaging with tags, accessories, and additional items that were sent in the package and are part of the item to be returned.
politicas-reembolso.texto8: Packaging costs are borne by the customer, so we suggest using the same packaging in which you received your purchase if it is not damaged or in an appropriate box that maintains the integrity of the product during transport.
politicas-reembolso.texto9: The return of the product must be made to the address:
politicas-reembolso.texto10: Avenida Mitre 6243, Dept 14E, Wilde, Avellaneda, BSAS, CP: 1875
politicas-reembolso.texto11: If you have any questions or doubts about our refund or return policies, we are available through our communication channels. You can email us at contact@vestore.com.ar with your question, full name, and phone number (if you wish to be contacted through another means).

faqs.descripcion1: Find quick answers to your questions! Here we gather the most common inquiries about our products and services. Explore this section to resolve your doubts in a simple and direct way.
faqs.pregunta1: What type of products do you sell?
faqs.pregunta12: Do you offer products wholesale and retail?
faqs.pregunta13: How can I get in touch with your customer service?
faqs.pregunta14: What are your customer service hours?
faqs.respuesta1: We sell a wide variety of electronic products, home accessories, and more to come.
faqs.respuesta12: Yes, we offer products both wholesale and retail. For wholesale purchases, we recommend visiting our wholesale pricing page.
faqs.respuesta13: You can contact our customer service through our online contact form or by emailing contacto@vestore.com.ar.
faqs.respuesta14: Our customer service hours are Monday to Friday from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Arg. Time.
faqs.pregunta2: Do I need to create an account to make a purchase?
faqs.pregunta21: How do I create an account on your website?
faqs.pregunta22: I forgot my password, how can I recover it?
faqs.pregunta23: Can I update my account information?
faqs.respuesta2: Yes, creating an account is necessary to make a purchase on our website. This helps us provide you with better service and order tracking.
faqs.respuesta21: You can create an account by clicking on the 'Create Account' link at the top right 'Account' and following the provided instructions.
faqs.respuesta22: You can recover your password by clicking on 'Forgot your password?' on the login page and following the steps to reset it.
faqs.respuesta23: Yes, you can update your account information at any time by accessing the 'My Account' section after logging in.
faqs.pregunta3: How do I place an order?
faqs.pregunta31: Can I modify or cancel my order after placing it?
faqs.pregunta32: Is there a minimum purchase amount for wholesale orders?
faqs.pregunta33: Can I place special or custom orders?
faqs.respuesta3: To place an order, simply select the products you wish to purchase, add them to your cart, and proceed to payment following the on-screen instructions.
faqs.respuesta31: Once confirmed, orders cannot be modified directly online. For cancellations or modifications, please contact us as soon as possible with the section Contact or by emailing contacto@vestore.com.ar.
faqs.respuesta32: Yes, there is a minimum purchase amount for wholesale orders. Visit our wholesale pricing page for more details.
faqs.respuesta33: Yes, we offer the possibility of placing special or custom orders. Please contact us directly to discuss your specific needs. importar / exportar
faqs.pregunta4: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.pregunta41: Is it safe to make payments on your website?
faqs.pregunta42: Can I change the payment method after placing an order?
faqs.pregunta43: What should I do if my payment is declined?
faqs.respuesta4: We accept a variety of payment methods for your convenience, including credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, Mercado Pago. We also offer payment via bank transfer option.
faqs.respuesta41: Yes, the security of your data is our top priority. Our website uses SSL (Secure Socket Layer) encryption technology to protect your personal and payment information. Additionally, we partner with trusted payment processors to ensure secure transactions.
faqs.respuesta42: Once the order has been confirmed and payment processed, it is not possible to change the payment method. However, you can contact our customer service team to see if there is any viable alternative depending on the status of your order.
faqs.respuesta43: If your payment has been declined, first verify that the payment details entered are correct and that your card has sufficient funds. If the issue persists, we recommend contacting your bank for further information. You can also try using a different payment method or contacting our customer service for additional assistance.
faqs.pregunta5: What are the estimated delivery times?
faqs.pregunta52: How can I track my order?
faqs.pregunta53: What should I do if my order arrives damaged or incorrect?
faqs.respuesta5: Delivery times may vary depending on the location and selected shipping method. In general, domestic orders are delivered within 3 to 7 business days, while international shipments may take between 10 and 15 business days. We will provide you with a tracking number so you can monitor the progress of your order.
faqs.respuesta51: Yes, we offer free shipping on orders that exceed a certain amount. Specific conditions for free shipping may vary depending on current promotions and the recipient's location. Please check our shipping policies or the product page for more details.
faqs.respuesta52: Once your order has been shipped, you will receive an email with a tracking number and a link to track your package. You can also enter this tracking number in the 'Order Tracking' section on our website to get real-time updates on the status of your delivery.
faqs.respuesta53: We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. If your order arrives damaged or incorrect, please contact our customer service team within 7 days of receiving the package. Provide us with photos of the damage or incorrect item, and we will work quickly to resolve the issue by either sending you a replacement or processing a refund.
faqs.pregunta6: What is the process for returning an item?
faqs.pregunta61: Can I return an item if I am not satisfied with my purchase?
faqs.pregunta62: How long does it take to process a refund?
faqs.pregunta63: Who covers the return shipping costs?
faqs.respuesta6:
To return an item, follow these steps:
Contact our customer service team within 14 days of receiving the product to initiate the return. Pack the item in its original packaging and make sure to include all accessories and tags. We will provide you with a return label and necessary instructions to send the item back. Once we receive the item and verify its condition, we will process your refund or exchange as agreed.
faqs.respuesta61: Yes, we accept returns of unused products in their original condition within 7 days of receipt. Please note that some items, such as customized or sale products, may not be eligible for return. Please review our return policies for specific details.
faqs.respuesta62: Once we have received and verified the returned item, the refund process may take up to 30 business days to complete. The exact time may vary depending on your bank or payment provider. We will notify you by email once the refund has been processed.
faqs.respuesta63: If the return is due to our error, such as a defective or incorrect item, we will cover the return shipping costs. However, if you wish to return an item for personal reasons, such as a change of mind, the return shipping costs will be your responsibility. We will provide you with a return label and deduct the shipping cost from the total refund amount.
faqs.pregunta7: How can I check the availability of a product?
faqs.pregunta71: What should I do if a product I want to buy is out of stock?
faqs.pregunta72: What is the return policy for out-of-stock products?
faqs.pregunta73: Do you offer discounts for wholesale purchases?
faqs.respuesta7: You can check the availability of a product in our online store. Each product has a stock indicator that will show you if it is available for purchase.
faqs.respuesta71: If a product is out of stock, you can subscribe to receive notifications when it becomes available again. You can also check with our customer service for information on restocking.
faqs.respuesta72: For out-of-stock products, the same return policies apply as for available products. You can return the product within the specified period and receive a refund or exchange according to our return and refund policies.
faqs.respuesta73: Yes, we offer discounts for wholesale purchases on certain products. Please contact our sales team for more details on available discounts and requirements for wholesale purchases.
faqs.respuesta8: We recommend you go to the Import section to resolve your questions!
faqs.respuesta81: We recommend you go to the Export section to resolve your questions!
faqs.pregunta9: What security measures do you have in place to protect customer information?
faqs.pregunta91: What personal information do you collect and how do you use it?
faqs.pregunta92: Do you share my personal information with third parties?
faqs.pregunta93: What should I do if I think my account has been compromised?
faqs.respuesta9: We take the security of our customers' information very seriously. We use advanced encryption technologies and maintain strict access policies to protect personal and financial data.
faqs.respuesta91: We collect personal information such as name, address, and contact details to process your orders and provide you with personalized service. This information is used in accordance with our privacy policies to enhance your shopping experience and comply with our legal obligations.
faqs.respuesta92: We do not sell or share your personal information with unauthorized third parties. We only share information when necessary to process your orders, comply with the law, or protect our rights.
faqs.respuesta93: If you suspect that your account has been compromised, we recommend that you change your password immediately and contact our support team to investigate in the Contact or by emailing contacto@vestore.com.ar and take additional steps to protect your account.
faqs.pregunta10: What referral programs do you offer?
faqs.pregunta101: How can I apply a discount code?
faqs.pregunta103: Are discounts available for wholesale purchases?
faqs.respuesta10: You can join our referral program by contacting us directly. By joining, you can benefit from special rewards for referring friends and family to shop at our store. You will also have access to exclusive promotions and additional discounts.
faqs.respuesta101: You can apply a discount code during the checkout process on our online store. There is a specific field where you can enter the discount code before completing your purchase. Be sure to verify the validity and conditions of the code before using it.
faqs.respuesta102: At the moment, we do not offer student discounts.
faqs.respuesta103: Yes, we offer discounts for wholesale purchases on certain products. For more details on available discounts and requirements for wholesale purchases, we recommend visiting our Wholesale section.

page-account.desde_el_panel: From your account dashboard you can easily check and view your recent orders, manage your shipping and billing addresses, and edit your password and account details.
page-account.confirmacion: Has been confirmed. Please check estimated delivery time in the order details section!
page-account.para_rastrear: To track your order, please enter your Order ID in the box below and press the "Track" button. This was given to you on your receipt and in the confirmation email you should have received.
page-account.parrafo1: It begins when the supplier confirms the order and registers it in a tracking system with a unique identification number. The package is transported to the port or airport of departure, passes through customs checks, and is shipped to the destination country, with periodic updates on its location in the system.
page-account.parrafo2: Upon arrival in the destination country, the package undergoes customs inspections and, once approved, is transferred to the local distribution network. The tracking system continues to provide updated information on its location and status until the package reaches the final customer, ensuring transparency at every stage of the process.
page-account.mantenme_al_tanto: Keep Me Updated on News and Exclusive Offers

exportar.exportar_text_1: At Vestore, we specialize in connecting your products with international markets through customized export solutions. We simplify the process so you can expand your business horizons with confidence that your products will arrive on time and in optimal condition.
exportar.exportar_text_2: We stand out for our dedication and experience, implementing advanced technology and strategies tailored to each client's needs. From advising on international regulations to logistical improvements for optimizing your shipments, we are committed to facilitating every stage of the process.
exportar.exportar_text_3: Trust Vestore to handle all your export needs. We have a specialized team and a global network of collaborators ensuring the competitiveness and efficiency of your business in the dynamic global market.
exportar.item_exportar_1: We offer qualified and expert export services
exportar.item_exportar_2: We use modern tools in the export process
exportar.item_exportar_3: We develop the digital future of international trade
exportar.item_exportar_4: We guarantee compliance and security in all your exports
exportar.con_mas_de_10_a√±os_exportar: With over 10 years in the sector, we have the necessary experience to manage your exports efficiently and safely.
exportar.utilizamos_estrategias_exportar: We use advanced strategies to reduce costs at every stage of the export process, maximizing your profitability.
exportar.nuestro_equipo_expertos: Our team of experts provides personalized support at all times, ensuring that your specific needs are met.
exportar.implementamos_medidas_exportar: We implement rigorous risk management measures to protect your goods and ensure your exports reach their destination smoothly.
exportar.personas_que_trabajan: The people working at Vestore share the same vision and values.
exportar.ellos_exportan_importan: They export and import with us.

importar.importar_text_1: At Vestore, we specialize in providing comprehensive import solutions that facilitate access to international markets. Our goal is to simplify the import process, giving you the peace of mind that your products will arrive on time and in perfect condition.
importar.importar_text_2: We stand out for our dedication and experience, using advanced technology and customized strategies for each client. Whether you need guidance to navigate the complexities of international regulations or logistical solutions to optimize your shipments, we are here to assist you every step of the way.
importar.importar_text_3: Trust Vestore to manage all your import needs. With a team of experts and a global network of partners, we ensure that your business remains competitive and efficient in the dynamic global market.
importar.te_traemos: We bring whatever you want right to your doorstep!
importar.faq-preg-1: I never imported, I don't know how to do it.
importar.faq-resp-1: Contact us for a free consultation. Tell us which products you want to import and from where. We will help you find reliable suppliers abroad. We have a network of contacts and tools to verify the quality and reputation of the suppliers.
importar.faq-preg-2: How much will it cost me to import? Are there any extra costs?
importar.faq-resp-2: We request quotes from the selected suppliers and present them to you so you can choose the one that best fits your needs and budget.
importar.faq-preg-3: What will be detailed in the quote you will send me?
importar.faq-resp-3:
1. Product Description:
- Details of the product you wish to import (name, quantity, technical specifications, etc.).
- Supplier information (name, location, contact).

2. Product Cost:
- Unit price and total price of the product based on the requested quantity.
- Currency used for the transaction (dollars, euros, etc.).

3. International Freight:
- Shipping method (air, sea, or land).
- Cost of transportation from the country of origin to Argentina.
- Estimated transit time.

4. Cargo Insurance:
- Cost of insurance to protect the goods during transportation.
- Coverage and terms of the insurance.

5. Customs Duties and Taxes:
- Estimate of tariffs and taxes payable upon entry of the goods into Argentina.
- Calculation based on the tariff classification of the product and its value.

6. Customs Procedures:
- Costs associated with customs clearance and release of the goods.
- Included services (customs clearance, documentation, etc.).

7. Storage Costs (if applicable):
- Breakdown of storage costs if the goods need to be temporarily stored.
- Duration and conditions of storage.

8. Local Transport:
- Cost of transportation from the port or airport in Argentina to your final location.
- Transport method (truck, courier, etc.).

9. Import Service Fees:
- Our fees for managing the entire import process.
- Included services (supplier sourcing, negotiation, logistics coordination, etc.).

10. Extra Costs (if applicable):
- Details of any additional costs that may arise (inspections, certifications, bank fees, etc.).
- Justification and explanation of these costs.

11. Terms and Conditions:
- Payment terms and accepted methods.
- Estimated delivery times.
- Policies regarding changes, cancellations, and returns.
importar.faq-preg-4: What is the minimum amount required to import?
importar.faq-resp-4: In Argentina, there is no legally established minimum amount required to conduct imports. However, based on our experience and to optimize costs and efficiency in the process, we recommend imports be conducted starting from a minimum value of 1,000 USD. This amount effectively covers associated costs and maximizes the profitability of your operation.
importar.faq-preg-5: Do I need to have a company to import merchandise?
importar.faq-resp-5: No, you do not need to have a company to import merchandise. Our comprehensive service takes care of the entire importation process, allowing you to receive your merchandise in Argentina without the need to open a company.
importar.faq-preg-6: How is the merchandise paid for?
importar.faq-resp-6: Paying for imported merchandise is a straightforward and flexible process. We offer multiple payment options to accommodate your needs and preferences.
importar.faq-preg-7: How is the quality of the merchandise controlled?
importar.faq-resp-7: Ensuring the quality of the merchandise is one of our priorities. We work with you to select reliable and reputable suppliers, conducting a thorough evaluation that includes their track record, production capacity, and adherence to quality standards. We verify the quality by requesting photographs, videos, physical samples, and weight checks. Additionally, we request all available quality certificates that support the product's compliance with international standards and agreed specifications, such as ISO certificates and laboratory test reports.
importar.faq-preg-8: Do I need to complete any paperwork?
importar.faq-resp-8: To import merchandise, you need to complete some basic procedures. Specifically, you need to: 1.Be registered as a 'Responsable Inscripto': You must be registered as a 'Responsable Inscripto' with the Administraci√≥n Federal de Ingresos P√∫blicos (AFIP) of Argentina. This registration allows you to conduct commercial import operations and fulfill corresponding tax obligations. 2.Declare a Fiscal Address: It's necessary to have a declared fiscal address registered with AFIP. This address is where you will receive all notifications and official communications related to your import operations.
importar.faq-preg-9: How long does an importation take?
importar.faq-resp-9: The time it takes for an importation can vary depending on several factors, but generally, the entire process can take between 6 and 15 business days.
importar.faq-resp-10: It is advisable to contract cargo insurance to protect your merchandise against damages or losses during transportation. We offer insurance options and assist you in selecting the appropriate coverage.
importar.faq-preg-11: I have other questions before requesting a quote, how can I address them?
importar.faq-resp-11: By our phone number, Instagram, email. (continue after)

shop-checkout.mantenme_informado: Keep me informed about news and exclusive offers

placeholder.cuentanos: <textarea class='form-control' placeholder='Tell us about what you want to import and we will contact you!' rows='5'></textarea>
